description: Try our easy to follow Cranberry, Oat & Raisin Cookies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cranberry, Oat & Raisin Cookies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the spread with the syrup in a saucepan over low heat, stirring, until melted. Remove from the heat, add the remaining ingredients, and mix well.

Spoon the dough onto a large baking sheet lined with parchment paper into 12 large mounds and press down slightly with the back of a spoon. Bake in a preheated oven, at 175°C, for 810 minutes, until the edges are golden but the centre are still soft.
Let cool for 23 minutes on the baking sheet before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
